actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill concerning the coverage of certain Indiana State employees under section 218 of the Social Security Act.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Includes coverage under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to all Indiana State employees who performed services in part-time postions during the period from January 1, 1969, to October 1, 1973, notwithstanding any other provision of the Act.

titles.title: A bill concerning the coverage of certain Indiana State employees under section 218 of the Social Security Act.
